job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the act of building and developing software applications, which falls under Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: met behulp van het FlutterFlow, n8n, Firebase en Supabase
job_tasks.justification: This phrase details the tools and frameworks used in the process of developing applications, fitting within Software Development.
This phrase indicates the creation of advanced AI applications which implies understanding the business need for such technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's aan end-to-end AI-applicatieontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on the full lifecycle of AI application development is a core aspect of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van Javascript, Python en Dart voor datatransformatie
job_tasks.justification: Data transformation is a key component of data engineering, preparing data for use in applications or models.

job_tasks.phrase: en het bouwen van custom functies
job_tasks.justification: Building custom functions is a direct software development task to extend application capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the need to understand business needs and translate technical AI concepts into solutions for clients.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: Improving development methodologies and services is part of the broader software development lifecycle and process improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's
Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing AI applications and mentions "cutting edge (gen)AI toepassingen" and translating AI concepts into practical applications. While it doesn't explicitly mention LLM fine-tuning or RAG, the focus on building end-to-end AI applications with specific frameworks suggests a GenAI Engineer role. However, the lack of explicit mention of core GenAI techniques limits the confidence score.
